name: A Long Night (icefire555)
description:
A long night is a short indie first-person psychological horror. It shouldn't take much more than 3-5 minutes to play!

If you find any bugs, feel free to document them and tell me and I'll fix them! 

A game heavily inspired by 
Something's Not Right Alanj2007 Games | Released 2014

Credits:

Stephano68 for some of the sounds!
